name: CVE-2009-4709
description: SQL injection vulnerability in the datamints Newsticker (datamints_newsticker) extension before 0.7.2 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.6.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:dirk_maiwert:datamints_newsticker:0.6.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
